Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value and quality, I believe it would be an excellent investment for you. Considering its worth to us and your anticipated benefit, we're offering this remarkable product to you for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between our valuation and your perceived value, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and contribute significantly to your endeavors. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
